column1: The Republic of Macedonia is a European country bordered by Serbia, Albania, Bulgaria, and Greece. Its flag consists of a yellow sun projecting eight yellow rays of light on a red background. The length of the flag is twice as long as the width. Approximately what portion of the flag is yellow?
